data.eml:eml: Lepidium key and Lepidium campestre In: Landot E., 2001. Flora des Kantons Zurich

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book / thesis / monograph Elias Landolt (2001): Lepidium key and Lepidium campestre In: Landot E., 2001. Flora des Kantons Zurich. Basel: Birkhäuser Verlag, ISBN: 3-7643-6010-0
